column5: Great fishin" Ernie...Looks like they need to raise the slot size soon...

Thanks for posting the pics! Looks like you doing well this year. And thanks for the pic where you are using a bottle cap to hold the fillets down while you skin... brilliant idea and a great excuse to open one up while cleaning! HH
i thought the same thing HH as I was going through the pics....  nice bass...nice walleye...more nice bass....fillet walleye with bottle cap ... holy crap, what a good idea!!!
Great season?  I'd have to agree with that!  Bottle cap idea is awesome too
Thats what they call,a mess of fish. WELL DONE.
Nice work Ernie! I use the bottle cap too....seems there is always one handy when its time to clean fish  S.
That bottle cap is so simple, but so effective when your hands are covered in fish.
Great report love the photos thanks for sharing.
Awesome haul ernie, must have been a blast! Love the bottle cap idea, not so keen on the big tapeworm just underneath it though
That's some good fishing there!!  Well done!
Whenever I want to scale fish, Just nail a few bottle caps to a short piece of 1X2. Makes the best fish scaler ever. Lots of good eats there
Nice report. Im loving the largies
Yah but what do you use if you drink out of cans?  Me bad!
Don't forget to use stainless staples.

Thanks for posting the pics! Looks like you doing well this year. And thanks for the pic where you are using a bottle cap to hold the fillets down while you skin... brilliant idea and a great excuse to open one up while cleaning! HH  Joe said it all first.  Agreed too... that is a great idea with the bottle cap.
